name: R3-search-modifier-code-for-R5
title: Cross-version VS for R3.SearchModifierCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/search-modifier-code|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R3 to R5.
